entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has descended into listlessness, but his dormant leadership qualities are galvanized by Ron's encouragement. He is trying to read Voldemort's thoughts and find out more about the Elder Wand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is encouraging Harry into action, suggesting they come up with a plan of action and re-examine all the places Tom Riddle had lived or worked. He insists on journeying to unlikely places to keep them moving.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is pestering Harry to come up with a plan of action and re-examine all the places Tom Riddle had lived or worked. She joins in with Ron's suggestions.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as someone who had lived or worked at various places, and Harry and his friends are trying to find out more about him.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone whose thoughts Harry is trying to read. He is also associated with the Elder Wand.

entities.name: the elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is an object that Harry is trying to find out more about, and it is associated with Voldemort.
